statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID as SiteID , AA.ID as ScrapBrandID , BB.SmapsBrandID as SmapsBrandID
, AA.Name as ScrapBrandName , CC.name as SmapsBrandName
, AA.ProductCount as ProductCount
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrandToSmaps BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ScrapBrandID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.SmapsBrandID = CC.ID
WHERE 1=1 AND AA.SiteID = #SiteID# AND ( ISNULL(#MappingYn#, '') = '' OR ( ISNULL(#MappingYn#, '') != '' AND ( (#MappingYn# = 'Y' AND BB.SmapsBrandID IS NOT NULL) OR (#MappingYn# = 'N' AND BB.SmapsBrandID IS NULL) ) ) )
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR CC.name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrandToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrandToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ScrapBrandID = #ScrapBrandID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapBrandToSmaps ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ScrapBrandID, SmapsBrandID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ScrapBrandID#, #SmapsBrandID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TScrapBrandToSmaps SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ScrapBrandID = #ScrapBrandID# , SmapsBrandID = #SmapsBrandID# WHERE ID = #ID#
